alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR... Locally dense fog was noted from near Two Harbors to Duluth and Superior and east along the South Shore of Lake Superior to near Cornucopia as of 1030 PM. This fog may last for another hour or two before ending later tonight. Some locations impacted by the dense fog include MN Highway 61 between Duluth and Silver Bay, I-35 between Midway and Thompson Hill to downtown Duluth, US Highway 2 between Superior and Maple, Highway 53 between Hawthorne and Superior, and WI Highway 13 between Parkland and Cornucopia, and WI Highway 35 between Superior and Pattison State Park. If traveling this evening, use caution. Use low-beam headlights, reduce your speed, and increase your following distance to allow more time to stop.
